data.title: List of films featuring the United States Navy SEALs
data.meta_description: There is a body of films that feature the United States Navy SEALs. The box office successes of Act of Valor in 2012 and Lone Survivor in 2013 led studios to seek out more real-life accounts of Navy SEALS to portray on film. Director Clint Eastwood is releasing American Sniper in 2015, and Eric...
